title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium] Learning Language of Thoughts without Language
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium] Learning Language of Thoughts without Language date:2024-05-14T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=11096&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Speaker: 안성진(KAIST SoC Professor) Title: Learning Language of Thoughts without Language Time: 16:00 , May 20, 2024 Location : E3-1 1501 (Offline) Language: English Here is the speaker's biography. Bio I am currently an Associate Professor in the School of Computing at KAIST . Before joining KAIST, I served as an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at Rutgers University and had an affiliation with the Center for Cognitive Science . I am the Director of the Machine Learning and Mind Lab , which operates at both KAIST and Rutgers . My academic background includes a Ph.D. from the University of California, Irvine , where I studied scalable approximate Bayesian inference under the supervision of Prof. Max Welling . Following this, I pursued a postdoctoral fellowship at MILA , working on deep learning with Prof. Yoshua Bengio as my mentor. If you want more information about the colloquium, please refer to the colloquium page: https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/colloquium/ . location: E3-1 1501 (Offline) tag:csweb.calendar
